channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Cash-strapped Bureau of Prisons freezes some hiring to ‘avoid more extreme measures,’ director says
item.description: The Trump administration is halting some hiring at the federal Bureau of Prisons, the crisis-plagued agency where chronic understaffing has led to long overtime shifts and the use of prison nurses, teachers, cooks and other workers to guard inmates.

item.title: Prevost, now Pope Leo XIV, overcame a taboo against a US pontiff
No verdict, mistrial declared, in trial of Michigan police officer who killed Congolese immigrant
